meanings.definition: To cook (food) on a rack or grate over hot charcoal or another fuel.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy charbroiling burgers on the grill during summer.
meanings.sent2: The chef is charbroiling the steaks for tonight's dinner service.
meanings.sent3: My dad tried charbroiling marshmallows, but they caught on fire!
meanings.sent4: The sun seemed to be charbroiling the earth with its scorching rays.
meanings.sent5: The smell of charbroiling meat wafted through the backyard, making everyone hungry.

meanings.definition: To grill (food) on a rack or grate over a direct heat source.
meanings.sent1: We will be charbroiling hot dogs at the campfire.
meanings.sent2: The cook was charbroiling vegetables for the vegetarian guests.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally charbroiled the chicken wings, turning them into charcoal.
meanings.sent4: The intense heat of the bonfire was charbroiling the sausages in no time.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of charbroiling fish filled the kitchen, making mouths water.
